author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Added a comment to all findNextElement() calls.

author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Refactor the parser classes for better maintenance.
* Made four cursor properties available for all parsers, the cursors will be
copied from the parent parser if this is available.
* Common code was placed in helper function in ezcTemplateElementParser, this
reduced overall code significantly.
* Replaced $hasParsed property with $status which contains the result of the
last parse operation.
* parse() function is now a general function which calls the abstract doParse(),
this is implemented in sub-classes instead of the parse() function.
The general function keeps track of status and updates cursors accordingly.
- Changes in ezcTemplateElementParser:
* Renamed eatWhitespace() to skipWhitespace() and made it a non-static method.
* Renamed parseComment() to skipComment().
* Added findNextElement() method to perform whitespace and comment skipping
which is commonly used.
- Added more documentation.
- Improved outputTree() ouput by using var_export for 'Type' values.
- Commented out expectations for test testParsingForeachBlock() which is
currently failing.
